job description:
Associate Scientist Discovery Biology
Emerging, clinical-stage, public biotech company in north Cambridge impacting life-altering diseases through novel immunology therapeutics is hiring an Associate Scientist or Research Associate who has 2 years' discovery biology experience working with proteins. This is a new, direct-hire position created due to company growth!

What You Need for this Position
M.S. or Ph.D. in related discipline with 2+ years' experience with:
  • Biophysical assay and/or biochemical development for proteins and protein-ligand interactions
What You Will Be Doing
Reporting to the Associate Director, Discovery Biology, your primary responsibilities will revolve around designing and executing biochemical and biophysical assays. With
Additional duties:
  • Data analysis and documentation
  • Present project results to scientific teams
  • Coordinate with CRO as needed
  • Support of target identification and hit/lead molecule characterization
Working with:
SDS/Native-PAGE, Western blot, Pull-down, ELISA, fluorescence, luminescence, and SPR-based formats

Top Reasons to Work with Us
  • 5 diverse programs in our pipeline with 2 already in phase II!
  • Research-focused management "willing to use never before seen technology"
  • Patient-focused company valuing regulatory and quality compliance in order to best serve patients
What's In It for You
  • Paid parking in Cambridge
  • Public transit assistance
  • Relocation Assistance
  • Competitive Salary
  • Stock Options
  • Great Benefits
  • Generous PTO/Vacation
  • Advancement Opportunities
  • Paid Holidays
  • Summer Schedule
  • Company Luncheons
  • Top-Rated Office Culture with Very Low Turnover
